commands: cd /var/www/summit || cd /home/ec2-user/summit || (echo 'Finding summit...' && find /home /var/www /opt -name 'summit' -type d 2>/dev/null | head -1 | xargs -I {} sh -c 'cd {} && pwd')
git status 2>&1 || echo 'Not a git repo, checking if code exists...'
cd server 2>/dev/null && pwd || echo 'Server dir not found'
